articles.author: Diego Colman
articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: Fed in Spotlight – Bullish Explosion or Crash Ahead? - DailyFX
articles.description: The Federal Reserve's decision and monetary policy guidance in the coming week will be the focus of financial markets. A hawkish outcome could be positive for the U.S. dollar and yields, but bearish for gold prices.
articles.content:
GOLD PRICE OUTLOOK
  • Gold prices retreated this week but are still up more than 5% in March
  • The Feds monetary policy announcement will take center stage in the coming week
  • This… [+3735 chars]

articles.author: Prakriti Chanda
articles.title: Kraken exec explains Bitcoin’s looming ‘tipping point’ - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: Amidst a BTC price pullback, Kraken's Head of Strategy tries to instill confidence in investors.
articles.content:
• Bitcoin dipped below the $70,000 threshold after a recent sell-off.
  • Exec highlighted BTCs volatility and its relatively small market cap, predicting an improved adoption curve.
